github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Always generate responses in small chunks (max 500 lines). Break large summaries into multiple parts with continuation prompts.
When generating status reports or summaries, use collapsible sections and reference files by path instead of showing full content.
Provide quick, scannable information first. Offer to expand details only when requested.
Use progress bars, tables, and bullet points instead of long paragraphs.
